name: Rockero Surfista Buena Onda
description:
Ride the waves on a journey to fight contamination with your guitar.
Monta las olas en un viaje por la lucha contra la contaminación con tu guitarra.

  • A infinite runner game made for the Globan GameJam 2017 about waves

-Avoid the trash

-Collect musical notes to destroy trash

  • GameJam 2017 version:

http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/rockero-surfista-buena-onda

  • Update 01/02/2017

-PC version uploaded

-Best Score
